Articles.Content:
Hi after Binky disappeared his BFT fuel tanks havent been updated, they are now not working and since he at the time didnt use any licence we basically cant do much.

So after pondering what to do i decided to install blender and unity and give it a go. Since i have never touched a 3D software in my life you can expect the worst. However it turned mostly ok if a bit crappy on the texture side.

So i m releasing a PreRelease and will carry on working on those.

This is released under the CC BY-SA 4.0

https://www.dropbox.com/s/cwsrovik4ttce41/acicft-pr1.zip
